QuestData.Title: Helping the Cause
QuestData.Description: Welcome back, $n! It seems the Jinyu have taken to our training even better than I had hoped. We're in the final stages of our preparations now.$b$bI need someone to go check in with Amber, Bold Karasshi, and Mishka. See if they need any help to complete their training.$b$bYou'll find Karasshi and Mishka here in Pearlfin Village. Amber is training recruits in Slingtail Pits to the northwest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Check in with Bold Karasshi, Amber Kearnen, and Mishka.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is everyone in order and ready to move?
QuestData.RewardText: Impressive work, $n. We should be ready to move out shortly. With our allies at our side, there is no way we can be defeated.
